divs: Sighting DetailsObject appeared suddenly out of nowhere and went on downward angled directional path and disappeared behing a tall building. This occurred at a high rate of speed. The object appeared to be some sort of missile-like aircraft but did not resemble a typical aircraft in that it was solid light with no visible wing structure. It was a wide band of light with a slight light trail behind it.
Summary: Streaked across the sky at low altitude and high speed.
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around September 1st 2011
